subdefinitions.definition: A swift , broad cutting stroke , especially one made with an edged weapon or whip .
examples: A slash of his blade just missed my ear.

subdefinitions.definition: ( sports ) A wide striking motion made with an implement such as a cricket bat , hockey stick , or lacrosse stick .
examples: He took a wild slash at the ball but the captain saved the team's skin by hacking it clear and setting up the team for a strike on the goal.

subdefinitions.definition: ( figuratively ) A sharp reduction in resources allotted .
examples: After the war ended, the army saw a 50% slash in their operating budget.

subdefinitions.definition: A deep cut or laceration , as made by an edged weapon or whip .
examples: He was bleeding from a slash across his cheek.

subdefinitions.definition: ( botany ) A deep taper - pointed incision in a plant .
( fashion ) A slit in an outer garment , usually exposing a lining or inner garment of a contrasting color or design .
( US and Canada ) A clearing in a forest , particularly one made by logging , fire , or other violent action .
( originally US , typography ) The slash mark : the punctuation mark ⟨ / ⟩. ( often proscribed ) Any similar typographical mark, such as the backslash ⟨ \ ⟩.

definitions.definition: ( US and Canada ) The loose woody debris remaining from a slash ; the trimmings left while preparing felled trees for removal .
examples: Slash generated during logging may constitute a fire hazard.

definitions.definition: ( fandom slang ) Slash fiction ; fan fiction focused on homoerotic pairing of fictional characters .

secondary_definitions: ( US and Canada ) The loose woody debris remaining from a slash ; the trimmings left while preparing felled trees for removal .
( fandom slang ) Slash fiction ; fan fiction focused on homoerotic pairing of fictional characters .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete , rare ) A drink of something ; a draft .
( UK , slang , vulgar ) A piss : an act of urination .
examples: Where's the gents ? I need to take a slash .

definitions.definition: ( UK , slang , vulgar , rare ) Piss ; urine .
examples: That bus shelter smells of slash .

main_definition: ( obsolete , rare ) A drink of something ; a draft .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , slang , vulgar ) A piss : an act of urination .
( UK , slang , vulgar , rare ) Piss ; urine .

definitions.definition: ( eastern US ) A swampy area ; a swamp .
( eastern US , uncommon ) A slash pine , which grows in such (swampy) areas.
( Scotland ) A large quantity of watery food such as broth .

main_definition: ( eastern US ) A swampy area ; a swamp .
secondary_definitions: ( eastern US , uncommon ) A slash pine , which grows in such (swampy) areas.
( Scotland ) A large quantity of watery food such as broth .

definitions.definition: Alternative form of slatch : a deep trough of finely - fractured culm or a circular or elliptical pocket of coal .

main_definition: ( UK ) Alternative form of slatch : a deep trough of finely - fractured culm or a circular or elliptical pocket of coal .
